entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor-wasm/Linux: getting two publish directories named `Publish`, and `publish` #20923
  • Given manifest layout ManifestReader should read out localized description #20922
  • SuppressTrimAnalysisWarnings should not be set for TFMs < 6.0 for EnableTrimAnalyzer #20921
    6.0.1xx
  • dotnet workload update command fails with ArgumentNullException #20914
  • Implicit SourceGenerator: System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration (net 6.0) #20913
  • Error NETSDK1102 when publishing ASP.NET Core Hosted Blazor WebAssembly App for win-x86 from a win-x64 machine #20908
  • Add fsi to dotnet watch #20907
  • NuGet.targets incorrectly performs a url-decode on filesystem paths, resulting in projects not found #20901
  • The workingDirectory in the launchSettings.json does not work when use dotnet run #20885

Closed

  • With .NET 6 RC2 SDK zip installed, maui workload update failed in CLI. #20889
  • After upgrade from net6 rc1 to rc2, the setup failed. #20834
  • `dotnet watch run` fails on a new F# project #18650
  • dotnet watch verbose started does not show arguments #20843

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix nuget config not being honored #20930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a test for SuppressRazorSourceGenerator incrementalism #20929
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix workload pack repair #20924
    Area-Workloads
  • Vary the cache key for TagHelpersFromReferences on SuppressRazorSourceGenerator #20920
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1355513 #20902
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Port updates to source generator from main #20918
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Blazor AOT Cache Busting #20630
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add command-line-api source-build dependency #20912
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Backport][Static web assets] Ensure subpath is always normalized (#20897) #20904
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Ensure dotnet root is not null #20898
    Area-Workloads
  • [Static web assets] Ensure subpath is always normalized #20897
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merge release/6.0.1xx with rc1 #20877
    Area-Workloads
  • Report args in dotnet watch ProcessRunner #20844
  • Remove MMI dependency #20867
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update ValidateExecutableReferences with new schema #19786
    Area-CLI
  • Pass in position to .GetSuggestions() #20852
  • Support multi-targeting for Roslyn components #20793
    Area-NetSDK
  • Fix workload pack records serialization #20876
    Area-Workloads
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
